summary: Standard camp shenanigans and romance amongst the counselors and the campers at a lake front summer camp.
cast: John Ratzenberger|Chad Allen|Jennifer Aniston|Candace Cameron Bure|Richard Herd|Dorothy Lyman|Danica McKellar|Breckin Meyer|Brian Robbins|Josh Saviano|Tasha Scott|Lauren Tewes|Jaleel White|G. Gordon Liddy|Sherman Hemsley|Patrick Thomas O'Brien|John Snee|Dion Zamora|Kari Whitman|Misty McCoy|Melanie Shatner|Rachel Verduzco|Kate Finlayson|Katsy Chappell|Sierra Samuel|Risa Schiffman|Ryan Canestro
title: Movida en el campamento II
